languages.text: {n}Глаза мужчины наполняются слезами благодарности.{/n} "Вы понимаете... Знаете, каково это — {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}из пепла{/d} да в новую жизнь. Клянусь, я усердным трудом свое прошлое перечеркну!"

{n}The man's eyes fill with tears of gratitude.{/n} "You understand... You know what it's like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}to rise from the ashes{/d} to a new life. I swear I'll write over my past with hard work!"
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза мужчины наполняются слезами благодарности.{/n} "Вы понимаете... Знаете, каково это — {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}из пепла{/d} да в новую жизнь. Клянусь, я усердным трудом свое прошлое перечеркну!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The man's eyes fill with tears of gratitude.{/n} "You understand... You know what it's like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}to rise from the ashes{/d} to a new life. I swear I'll write over my past with hard work!"

{n}The man's eyes fill with tears of gratitude.{/n} "You understand... You know what it's like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}to rise from the ashes{/d} to a new life. I swear I'll write over my past with hard work!"

{n}The man's eyes fill with tears of gratitude.{/n} "You understand... You know what it's like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}to rise from the ashes{/d} to a new life. I swear I'll write over my past with hard work!"

{n}The man's eyes fill with tears of gratitude.{/n} "You understand... You know what it's like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}to rise from the ashes{/d} to a new life. I swear I'll write over my past with hard work!"

{n}The man's eyes fill with tears of gratitude.{/n} "You understand... You know what it's like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}to rise from the ashes{/d} to a new life. I swear I'll write over my past with hard work!"

languages.text: {n}男の目に感謝の涙が溢れる。{/n}「あなたは理解してくださる…{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}灰の中から立ち上がって{/d}新たな人生を送るということがどのようなものか、ご存知なのですね。誓います、勤勉に働くことで過去を塗り替えてみせます！」
languages.original_text: {n}The man's eyes fill with tears of gratitude.{/n} "You understand... You know what it's like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}to rise from the ashes{/d} to a new life. I swear I'll write over my past with hard work!"

traits.locale_text: {n}男の目に感謝の涙が溢れる。{/n}「あなたは理解してくださる…{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}灰の中から立ち上がって{/d}新たな人生を送るということがどのようなものか、ご存知なのですね。誓います、勤勉に働くことで過去を塗り替えてみせます！」

languages.text: {n}Die Augen des Mannes füllen sich mit Tränen der Dankbarkeit.{/n} "Ihr versteht ... Ihr wisst, wie das ist, sich {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}aus der Asche zu erheben{/d} und ein neues Leben zu beginnen. Ich schwöre, ich werde meine Vergangenheit durch harte Arbeit tilgen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The man's eyes fill with tears of gratitude.{/n} "You understand... You know what it's like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}to rise from the ashes{/d} to a new life. I swear I'll write over my past with hard work!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen des Mannes füllen sich mit Tränen der Dankbarkeit.{/n} "Ihr versteht ... Ihr wisst, wie das ist, sich {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}aus der Asche zu erheben{/d} und ein neues Leben zu beginnen. Ich schwöre, ich werde meine Vergangenheit durch harte Arbeit tilgen!"

languages.text: {n}Adamın gözleri minnet yaşlarıyla doluyor.{/n} "Anlıyorsunuz... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}Küllerinden doğup{/d} yeniden hayat bulmanın ne demek olduğunu biliyorsunuz. Yemin ederim, geçmişimi alın teriyle yeniden yazacağım!"
languages.original_text: {n}The man's eyes fill with tears of gratitude.{/n} "You understand... You know what it's like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}to rise from the ashes{/d} to a new life. I swear I'll write over my past with hard work!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Adamın gözleri minnet yaşlarıyla dolar.{/n} "Anlıyorsunuz... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}Küllerinden doğup{/d} yeniden hayat bulmanın ne demek olduğunu biliyorsunuz. Yemin ederim, geçmişimi alın teriyle yeniden yazacağım!"

languages.text: {n}Agradecido, el hombre empieza a llorar.{/n} «Usted lo entiende... Sabe lo que es {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}resurgir de las cenizas{/d} en una nueva vida. ¡Juro que trabajaré para enmendar mi pasado!».
languages.original_text: {n}The man's eyes fill with tears of gratitude.{/n} "You understand... You know what it's like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}to rise from the ashes{/d} to a new life. I swear I'll write over my past with hard work!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Agradecido, el hombre empieza a llorar.{/n} «Usted lo entiende... Sabe lo que es {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}resurgir de las cenizas{/d} en una nueva vida. ¡Juro que trabajaré para enmendar mi pasado!».

languages.text: {n}船员眼中噙满了感激的泪水。{/n}“您明白……您明白从{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}灰烬中重生{/d}，开始新的人生是什么感觉。我发誓，我一定会努力工作，让我的过去彻底翻篇！”
languages.original_text: {n}The man's eyes fill with tears of gratitude.{/n} "You understand... You know what it's like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}to rise from the ashes{/d} to a new life. I swear I'll write over my past with hard work!"

traits.locale_text: {n}船员眼中噙满了感激的泪水。{/n}“您明白……您明白从{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}灰烬中重生{/d}，开始新的人生是什么感觉。我发誓，我一定会努力工作，让我的过去彻底翻篇！”

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de l'homme s'emplissent de larmes de gratitude.{/n} « Vous comprenez... Vous savez ce que c'est, de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}renaître de ses cendres{/d} et d'essayer de changer sa vie. Je vous jure que je ferai oublier mon passé en travaillant d'arrache-pied ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The man's eyes fill with tears of gratitude.{/n} "You understand... You know what it's like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}to rise from the ashes{/d} to a new life. I swear I'll write over my past with hard work!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de l'homme s'emplissent de larmes de gratitude.{/n} « Vous comprenez... Vous savez ce que c'est, de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}renaître de ses cendres{/d} et d'essayer de changer sa vie. Je vous jure que je ferai oublier mon passé en travaillant d'arrache-pied ! »
